name: interactive-cv
description: Interactive CV with Vue.js frontend and Express.js backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: siBregas
